name: Byte Sabor
description:
What is Byte Sabor?

Byte Sabor is a fast paced endless arcade game. Use your teleporting ability to dash between enemies, obliterating those that cross your path. Fight randomly generated bosses with unique patterns, then collect their drops which may make the game easier or harder by changing crucial stats about it. How can you tell what it does? Pick it up and find out!

How to play:

  • Hold down O/Z to prepare a teleport. Use the arrows to position the cursor, then let go to teleport to the location. Enemies caught between your start and end point (indicated by the line) will be damaged!
  • Use the arrow keys to move normally when not teleporting.
  • The bar on the left is your health. Taking damage directly or allowing an enemy to escape off screen will reduce your health.
  • The bar on the right is your chain.

Credits:

  • Noba - Programming and sound effects
  • Nyeti - Music https://soundcloud.com/a-j-white-420065892/ & https://twitter.com/yewhall & https://yewhall.itch.io/
